revision.text: ::*{{c|'''FSMode_ScaleToFit'''}} - Scale the bounding box to fit the view port with dynamic pillarboxing and letterboxing based on aspect ratio ::*{{c|'''FSMode_ScaleToFill'''}} - Scale the bounding box to fit the view port with dynamic cropping based on aspect ratio ::*{{c|'''FSMode_ScaletoFit43'''}} - Scale the bounding box to fit a centered 4:3 area in the view port ::*{{c|'''FSMode_ScaleToScreen'''}} - Stretch the bounding box to fill the entire view port ::*{{c|'''FSMode_ScaleToFit43Top'''}} - Same as FSMode_ScaleToFit43 but set the bounding box's top to the top of the view port ::*{{c|'''FSMode_ScaleToFit43Bottom'''}} - Same as FSMode_ScaleToFit43 but set the bounding box's bottom to the bottom of the view port ::*{{c|'''FSMode_ScaleToHeight'''}} - Scale the bounding box to always fit the view port vertically
